channel.title: Chaotic weapon animations
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I dont know which animation to use for chaotic rapier and longsword i am using delta!
It is both server and client sided, because you declare it in server, so which animation do i use for rapier because i am curently using default and it looks stupid, same with longsword!
